definition[0]: a container or envelope used for sending something small by post
definition[1]: a piece of advertising material designed to be sent by mail
example[0]: The marketing plan could include sending mailers to likely purchasers.
definition[2]: a person or organization that sends mail, especially in large quantities
example[1]: Big corporate mailers try to get discounts from the U.S. Postal Service.
definition[3]: a container or envelope used for sending something small by mail
